wt.security

Class RuntimeAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • Access
      • wt.security.RuntimeAccess

  • public class RuntimeAccess
extends Access
    Class that provides wrappers to privileged runtime methods using the wt.security package. This allows applets to execute applications on the client which is typically restricted by the sandbox.

    Supported API: true

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Process exec(java.lang.String command)
      Wrapper for Runtime.getRuntime().exec() method.

      java.lang.Process exec(java.lang.String[] cmdarray, java.lang.String[] envp, java.io.File workDir)
      Wrapper for Runtime.getRuntime().exec() method.
      static RuntimeAccess getRuntimeAccess()
      Get instance of RuntimeAccess.
      static RuntimeAccess getRuntimeAccess(java.awt.Frame parentFrame)
      Get instance of RuntimeAccess.
      void load(java.lang.String filename)
      Wrapper for Runtime.getRuntime().load() method.
      void loadLibrary(java.lang.String libname)
      Wrapper for Runtime.getRuntime().loadLibrary() method.
      void openOrRun(java.io.File file)
      Tries to use Java 6 Desktop API to open the file and then if that fails falls back to trying run(String).
      java.lang.Process run(java.lang.String file)
      Deprecated. 
      Use openOrRun(File) or DesktopAccess open() or edit() APIs instead as these are cross-platform.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getRuntimeAccess

        public static RuntimeAccess getRuntimeAccess(java.awt.Frame parentFrame)
        Get instance of RuntimeAccess. This instance can then be used to perform runtime operation that are typically restricted by the sandbox.

        Supported API: true
        Parameters:
        parentFrame - the parent frame for security dialog boxes that may be presented

      • getRuntimeAccess

        public static RuntimeAccess getRuntimeAccess()
        Get instance of RuntimeAccess. This instance can then be used to perform runtime operation that are typically restricted by the sandbox.

        Supported API: true

      • run

        public final java.lang.Process run(java.lang.String file)
                            throws WTSecurityException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        Deprecated. Use openOrRun(File) or DesktopAccess open() or edit() APIs instead as these are cross-platform.
        Method to load a file with the associated application. This method is currently only implemented in Windows by passing the filename to "rundll32.exe url.dll,FileProtocolHandler file://"

        Supported API: true
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be loaded by it's associated executable
        Throws:
        WTSecurityException
        java.io.IOException

      • openOrRun

        public final void openOrRun(java.io.File file)
                     throws WTSecurityException,
                            java.io.IOException
        Tries to use Java 6 Desktop API to open the file and then if that fails falls back to trying run(String).

        Supported API: true
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be loaded by it's associated executable
        Throws:
        WTSecurityException
        java.io.IOException
